attributes.action: Tighten rules on donations, lobbying, and campaign spending.
attributes.additional_details: The United kingdom has long been a bastion of democracy in the world, and with influence from Russia, china, and the US, we must be sure that our system is robust and democratic enough to withstand them.
attributes.background: Ban donations to members of parliament councillors etc above a certain amount, publicly fund elections, with a certain amount of money spent per constituency and spread out between candidates, and have stricter reporting requirements for lobbying from think tanks etc.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign a petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/707338
